description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a desk with a roll top and drawers and a high back in pink and green on the left and center portion of the page; on the right are three women's hats in blue and white
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Trente-troisième Cahier, 10 Octobre 1788
